actions.text: Learner will experience team work to successfully run a campaign in thier own community

What: Learner will understand how essential it is to work with other people to achieve a desired goal
How:
- Watch a video on team-work/collaboration 
-  Co-create a design for campaign by identifying people in the community with right skills
- Together execute the campaign.
Hey @contact.name We have so many projects which are difficult to do alone and when taken help from others, it just gets done in no time. That's the magic of TEAM-WORK

Would you like to learn more about Team -Work?
A. Yes
B. No
Then I have an activity perfect for you!
<link to ‚Äústart‚Äù no loop>

Lets begin by watching a small video shwoing examples of good Team-Work and bad team work

Type SEE to watch now.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fUXdrl9ch_Q

Type DONE when you have finished watching

Awesome now that we have seen examples, let's learns how to get better at Team-Work. 
 Would you like to give it a try ?
A. Yes
B. No
Awesome!! let's get started
<link to ‚Äúintro‚Äù no loop>

To pratice team-work funDoo has come with a mini project called " Covid-Vaccination Awareness Campaign" . Here you will have to built a team of 3-5 people and together create a design for a campaign for your nearby community. 

Type IMAGE to find all the details of the campaign
Hey  @contact.name type the right keyword to proceed or type SKIP if you want to skip.
<link to "prep" no loop>

Creative content
Covid-Vaccination Awareness Campaign
1. Team Size : 3-5 people
2. Goal/Objective of the campaign. 
a)To bring awareness about the importance of Covid -vaccination
b)Its benefits and side-effects
c) How can one apply for vaccination at the Co-WIN platform. 
4. Reach: the design should be such that it can reach 1000+ people 
5. Mode of execution: Online or Offline as per team's availibiltiy and resources.

type OKAY once you have read the details of the campaign.

You will need an hour's time to identify the team members and check if they are available to support you for the campaign.
Once identified, share the details of the campaign by forwarding the image to them.

Are You Ready to find team members now ?
A. Yes I am ready
B. No I will need more time

Fantastic :) Lets identify team members 
Steps to note.
1. Time Availability: Do they have time that is required for the campaign
2. Skills:What strength the member has that can be useful for the project. 
3. Team player :Are they open to working in teams.
4. Common vision:Do they find this campaign important and needed by the community.

Type DONE when you have identified team members
Sure! Take your time. Type START when you feel you are ready :)

Great work! For any team to work well, it's important to build relationship and comfort

type NEXT to see how can team members get to know eachother better.

STEP 1: Get to know each other
 Get together online /offline and discuss your education, hobbies, work aspirations and why this campaign is important for each one of you. Share some personal stories to make everyone around feel comfortable and connected.
STEP 2: Disucss details of the topic
discuss details around objective /goals / needs/ methods of the campaign and note down all the ideas. Invite team members to talk freely.
STEP 3: Pick roles and responsibilities
Give team members time to choose what role they would like to take up and if they need any help in it. Discuss responsibilities briefly. 
STEP 4: Create a plan and a timeline 
 Toegther come up with a timeline to submit individual work. Make sure everyone feels comfortable and is sharing their views. Also plan a timetable around the execution plan. 
STEP 5: Share the planning 
Once the plan is ready note down all the details and share it with all team members. 

 type DONE when the plan is ready!!!

Would you like to share your plan for the campaign with funDoo and earn U-points?
A. Yes
B. No
Great, click a picture and add it here / you can also upload a file if needed
No problem, its okay :) I hope you have a solid plan ready !!

Thank you for sharing! Here are your  <large> U POINTS for successful completion of the task üòäüòäüòä

Type OK to move ahead
